title: The Best Work-From-Home-or-Office Gadgets: Boring but Useful Gifts for Hybrid Life
sub_head: Our Personal Tech columnists recommend headphones, printers, cord organizers and other gadgets for the new work-anywhere reality
body:
Is there a chance that giving someone a printer, a desk-cord organizer or a bag for electronic accessories could imply you don’t, you know, like that person?
Absolutely not! Nothing says “I love you” like a boring gadget gift.
